3428.text: [3428] link 'Overhead shot of three pairs of hands, each holding small green plants in soil. What is Earth Day and what has it achieved? The worldwide event aims to raise awareness about the need to protect the environment. 21 Apr 2025 Science & Environment' url: https://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-68610073

3048.text: [3048] heading 'What is Earth Day and what has it achieved?'

3435.text: [3435] StaticText 'What is Earth Day and what has it achieved?'

3437.text: [3437] StaticText 'The worldwide event aims to raise awareness about the need to protect the environment.'

3445.text: [3445] link 'A woman fans herself as she crosses London Bridge from the City of London in the evening sun on the hottest day of the year so far on the 30th of July 2024, London, United Kingdom UK Government not taking climate seriously - advisers The government has made little progress in preparing the UK for rising temperatures, climate watchdog the CCC says. 3 hrs ago Climate' url: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cvgpey03pnno

3058.text: [3058] heading 'UK Government not taking climate seriously - advisers'

3449.text: [3449] StaticText 'UK Government not taking climate seriously - advisers'

3450.text: [3450] StaticText 'The government has made little progress in preparing the UK for rising temperatures, climate watchdog the CCC says.'

3459.text: [3459] link 'A satellite image shows a large area of brown vegetation at its centre, with some smoke visible. Green, unburned agricultural fields are visible to the north. The coastline and sea can be seen to the east. Area burned by UK wildfires in 2025 already at annual record The prolonged dry, sunny weather in March and April created ideal conditions for wildfires to spread. 3 days ago Climate' url: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c0m9gm3jwljo

3463.text: [3463] image 'A satellite image shows a large area of brown vegetation at its centre, with some smoke visible. Green, unburned agricultural fields are visible to the north. The coastline and sea can be seen to the east.' url: https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/1024/cpsprodpb/d3a7/live/00f64ad0-21df-11f0-9060-674316cb3a1f.jpg.webp

3467.text: [3467] heading 'Area burned by UK wildfires in 2025 already at annual record'

3468.text: [3468] StaticText 'Area burned by UK wildfires in 2025 already at annual record'

3470.text: [3470] StaticText 'The prolonged dry, sunny weather in March and April created ideal conditions for wildfires to spread.'

3479.text: [3479] link "A composite image of wind turbines standing with a large Canadian flag behind them Canada's top candidates talk up fossil fuels as climate slips down agenda Amid tariff threats from the US, energy and economic security are key issues in Canada's federal election. 21 Apr 2025 US & Canada" url: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c87pev3jpyyo

3488.text: [3488] StaticText "Canada's top candidates talk up fossil fuels as climate slips down agenda"

3490.text: [3490] StaticText "Amid tariff threats from the US, energy and economic security are key issues in Canada's federal election."

3499.text: [3499] link 'The biomass satellite sits inside an all-white warehouse. It has a black cone-like base, an orange l-shaped top that has the look of foil, with the antenna attached and furled. To the left of the satellite sit two shells which will hold the satellite, they are white elongated cones with "ESA" written on them, and held in blue scaffolding trolleys. The satellite that will \'weigh\' world\'s 1.5 trillion trees The new satellite will be able to see through clouds and forest canopies. 17 hrs ago Climate' url: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/crldwjj6d6no

3503.text: [3503] image 'The biomass satellite sits inside an all-white warehouse. It has a black cone-like base, an orange l-shaped top that has the look of foil, with the antenna attached and furled. To the left of the satellite sit two shells which will hold the satellite, they are white elongated cones with "ESA" written on them, and held in blue scaffolding trolleys. ' url: https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/1024/cpsprodpb/2550/live/86a79fb0-243e-11f0-a39f-efaa71114000.jpg.webp

3507.text: [3507] heading "The satellite that will 'weigh' world's 1.5 trillion trees"

3508.text: [3508] StaticText "The satellite that will 'weigh' world's 1.5 trillion trees"

3510.text: [3510] StaticText 'The new satellite will be able to see through clouds and forest canopies.'
